data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The modules list above contain some calculation routines for
    astronomy. My proposed name space allows for more obscure
    mathematical computations for astronomers and perl coders. I have
    been looking for routines for astronomy to calculate planet
    coordinates, moon phases, and sun rise/set as well as other
    astronomical calculation. I think this is a appropriate name space
    because all the functions in my proposed module are mathematical
    and, more importantly, astronomical.
